New Records: The 2024 season has seen a record-high nine homers land in the river: four by Cruz, three by Tellez and one each by McMahon and Pederson.
Key Match Events: Rowdy Tellez hit two home runs into the Allegheny River, one on Aug. 24, 2024, against the Reds and on Sept. 7, 2024, against the Nationals.
Miscellaneous Highlights: There have been three players to hit more than one homer into the Allegheny River as a visiting player at PNC Park, including Matt Olson, Travis Shaw, and Derek Dietrich.
Others: The shortest distance from PNC Parkâ€™s home plate to the Allegheny River is 456 feet -- straight down the right-field line.
